options.craftui.preferNativeFileDialog.t: Prefer the native system file dialog over the ImGui one. Hangs the main window on MacOS.
options.craftui.enableViewports.tooltip: If set, widget windows may be moved outside the primary game window. Can cause unexpected behavior.
options.craftui.layoutPersistent.tooltip: Save the ImGui layout to disk, preserving window positions between game instances.
options.craftui.resetLayout.tooltip: Reset the layout of all CraftUI apps.
options.craftui.enableDebugCommands.tool: Enable the craftui client command, exposing a variety of debug features.
